### mapMetadata() {#a6852abc453071fe0ae6e3cb7a8e7920e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Metadata &#42; Mapper::mapMetadata (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; MD)</>}>
Map metadata.

Find the mapping for MD. Guarantees that the return will be resolved (not an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a>, or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#ac8c31a76a81b27c7307d65575b62084f">MDNode::isResolved()</a> returns true).
